Tropical CO2 mixing ratios
1945-1958: Extension back in time based on growth rate and estimate of seasonal cycle.
1958-1979: Based on Mauna Loa.
1979-2023: MBL data set from NOAA (https://gml.noaa.gov/ccgg/mbl/).

        Year       CO2 (ppm)
